channel.title: Solved, Remove Please
channel.description:
I downloaded the RuneLimited client from the link provided by Galkon, and upon running the client, I got this: [img]http://gyazo.com/45963388d98b748dbcae99cdd1c25f30.png[/img] Afterwards, I changed the cache url to my own personal host, and it did install the cache: resulting in the same result upon running. What can I do to get the client to run?
P.S. Sorry for the image size, I couldn't find any way to make spoiler tags..

item.title: Solved, Remove Please
item.dc:creator: @darthbonsly darthbonsly
item.description:
@darthbonsly wrote:

I downloaded the RuneLimited client from the link provided by Galkon, and upon running the client, I got this:

45963388d98b748dbcae99cdd1c25f30.png1439×987

Afterwards, I changed the cache url to my own personal host, and it did install the cache: resulting in the same result upon running.
What can I do to get the client to run?

P.S. Sorry for the image size, I couldn’t find any way to make spoiler tags…

Read full topic
